title: Flash Sale
short_description: Hurry Limited Time Only– Save up to 30% off on your stay + Receive 50% off on Resort Fee. Valid for stays from May through October. Book by Feb 23,2020
seo_description: Hurry Limited Time Only– Save up to 30% off on your stay + Receive 50% off on Resort Fee
long_description:
Relax by the pool and enjoy the beautiful blue sky and warm sun. If you need some refreshments you are only steps away from cool delicious cocktails.

Receive up to 30% off + 50% off on Resort Fee.

Offer valid for stays from May through October.

Offer ends February 23, 2020.

BOOK NOW
terms_conditions:
Non-Refundable rate. Your credit card will be charged 100% of the total price of the reservation at the time of booking.

No refund will be provided in case of modifications or cancellation. Please note, if canceled, modified or in case of No-Show or Early Departure, the total price of the reservation will be charged.

A hold of $100 will be placed on the guest credit card at check-in for incidentals. This hold will be released upon check-out pending any incidental charges.

Resort Fee provides guests the following services:

• Shuttle service loop to old town.

• Onsite concierge.

• Access to fitness center and 2 pools.

• Newspaper available in lobby.

• Resort activities and entertainment.

• Daily water in room.

• Keepsake luggage tags.

• Wireless high speed internet access.

• Local calls.

• Onsite parking.

• 10% off Starbucks.

Guarantee/Deposit and Change/Cancellation Fees will depend on selected dates and room/rate combination.
